Kings in Pt Severn has always been good to us.
It's in Mississauga but Citywide Welding is awesome!!! When I visit Ontario I bring my dinged up props for repair there. There is no one in Yellowknife that does prop repair.
You've found a new side gig.
Kings send props to United. Citywide is great. Kawartha is supposed to be good too. Depends on where your buddy is, he can't go wrong with any of these 3
